title: Takealot – SA’s #1 Online Mobile Shopping App
description:
Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app, and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point!
Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.
Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.
Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and vitamins to books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more.
Order on your mobile in less than a minute, with easy, safe payment options, including credit, debit and Instant EFT. Takealot lets you shop securely, with biometric face or thumbprint ID. Unless your password is “password”, you’re going to love this nifty new login method. Simply use fingerprint or facial recognition to quickly and easily start shopping on SA’s #1 online shopping app.
Get your goodies delivered to your door anywhere in South Africa, even on weekends. Deliveries are contact-free, so simply pick up the package when it’s dropped off at your doorstep.
We promise safe, reliable delivery on every order – free when you spend over R450 – and hassle-free returns if something isn’t right. T&Cs apply.
Takealot: Shop Anything You Can Imagine.
Download now to get everything you like to buy, delivered right to your door!
TAKEALOT FEATURES:
SALES & DISCOUNTS
• Find great deals on everyday essentials!
• Daily deals with big discounts!
• Pet care, vitamins, cleaning supplies, groceries, tech, beauty & much more
ONLINE SHOPPING MADE EASY
• Browse, search and buy millions of Takealot products across 28 departments any time, anywhere
• Easy, safe payment options including Instant EFT, credit & debit cards and more
• Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter and more
• Secure login with face or thumbprint ID biometrics
SECURE DELIVERY
• Fast & reliable delivery to your door, anywhere in South Africa
• Contactless delivery
• FREE SHIPPING & COLLECTIONS when you spend R450 or more
• Shop and track your order every step of the way, from checkout to your front door, right from the app
• Hassle-free returns if something isn’t right
GREAT DEALS
• Big savings on App Only Deals, Daily Deals and special promotions
• Price-check items you see in stores using our barcode scanner to find the best deal
• Filter deals by department
MILLIONS OF PRODUCTS
Browse and buy unbeatable deals in:
• Mobile, Cellular & GPS
• Heaters
• Cameras
• Home & Kitchen Appliances
• Books and eBooks
• Health & Wellness
• Beauty & Makeup
• Medicine
• Household Cleaning
• Baby & Toddler
• Office & Stationery
• Pet Supplies
• Groceries
• Toiletries
• Home fitness
• Kitchenware
• Coffee essentials
• Body & Hair Care
• And more!
Shop for anything you can imagine and get it from your fingertips to your front door. Download the takealot.com mobile app today and find everything you need in one place!

Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app, and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point!
  
Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.
 
Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.
 
Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and vitamins to books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more.
 
Order on your mobile in less than a minute, with easy, safe payment options, including credit, debit and Instant EFT. Takealot lets you shop securely, with biometric face or thumbprint ID. Unless your password is “password”, you’re going to love this nifty new login method. Simply use fingerprint or facial recognition to quickly and easily start shopping on SA’s #1 online shopping app.
 
Get your goodies delivered to your door anywhere in South Africa, even on weekends. Deliveries are contact-free, so simply pick up the package when it’s dropped off at your doorstep.
 
We promise safe, reliable delivery on every order – free when you spend over R450 – and hassle-free returns if something isn’t right. T&Cs apply.
